openapi-mobile-client.description: The OpenAPI Mobile Client is the mobile application which helps user to easily perform HTTP requests using their mobile devices.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description:
My passion for coding was born in school where I began writing some simple applications using Delphi. Later during my university period I've got acquainted with more advanced programming languages, such as C++, Kotlin, Java, JavaScript, Python and the most important (at least for me) - C#.

Now I am a full stack software developer. During my work experience I've used different kinds of languages and toolsets. For instance at the first job I was using Xamaring framework for developing a cross-platform chat bot. Than I used C# and ASP NET MVC for writing BE logic and JavaScript with Jquery plugin for FE part. Also I've used Unity for implementing a new feature for the existing game and developing a brand new AR application from scratch. Today in my work I am using C# (ASP.NET Core) and TypeScript (Angular 8).

I like to learn new technologies. I have a quite good experience with Unity Engine so that I even created a mobile game called "Drag and Score" which you can find in Google Play Store. Also during my free time I've managed to learn Flutter framework and its main language - Dart. As a result of my studying I've developed a cross-platform mobile application for automating a process of creating HTTP API requests from clients to the server.

data-art.description:
Working with the project which is written using Ruby on Rails framework. Integrating this project to the main system which is based on .NET technologies.
Using the following technologies: Ruby on Rails, Sidekiq, RSpec, React, ASP.NET Core, PostgreSQL, T-SQL, MongoDB.
On this project I communicate with clients a lot (even more than on my previous project) since they are a part of our dev team.

redwerk.description: Participating in creating a new WEB application based on microservices. For creating a back-end logic using a ASP.NET Core. For creating a front-end logic - Angular 8. Working with Cosmos DB and Docker. Participating in meetings with clients to fully understand requirements.

pnn-soft.description: Maintained existing monolith WEB application, created using framework ASP NET MVC. Writing code for back-end part using C# language as well as for front-end part using a JavaScript and JQuery library. Because I have a good knowledge of Unity I also participated in two different projects where we used this engine. The first one was a runner game. Here I developed a new level by writing a new functionality and placing 3d models in a scene as a game designer. In the second project I developed a simple Augmented Reality mobile application using Unity Foundation.

freelance.description: Developed a simple chat bot using Xamarin framework.

kpi.university: National Technical University of Ukraine "Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute"
kpi.description: As a result of my studying in a university I have created a mobile application using cross-platform framework Flutter. This application is similar to a Swagger but for mobile platforms. It simplify the process of creating and sending HTTP API requests from clients to the servers.
